subject: Speed Skating
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: A five-time Olympian from Germany, Claudia Pechstein was found in February to have abnormal variations in her base levels. This week, a Swiss court ruled she could compete in Utah.
snippet: A five-time Olympian from Germany, Claudia Pechstein was found in February to have abnormal variations in her base levels. This week, a Swiss court ruled she could compete in Utah.
